skill.name: Blade Vigor
skill.desc: Heal 126 (%i:scaleAP%%i:scaleHealth%) and deal 125 (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage to the current target. Healing and damage are increased by up to 100% based on Aatrox's missing health.

skill.name: Pure Heart Breaker
skill.desc:
Deal 460 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to the current target, increased up to 50% based on the target's missing health.

If the target dies, deal 55% of overkill damage split between the 2 closest enemies, plus 10 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage per target.

skill.name: Piercing Phantom Strike
skill.desc:
Mark the farthest unmarked target within 4 hexes, then dash through all marked enemies in order. Each dash deals 95 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to its target and 80 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to other enemies hit.

If only one enemy remains, dash 3 times instead

skill.name: Gates of Avarosa
skill.desc: The next 8 attacks fire bonus arrows dealing 144 (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) total physical damage split between the target and up to two random enemies within 2 hexes.

skill.name: El Tigre Tornado
skill.desc:
Stun the target and spin them around for 1.5 seconds, dealing 575 (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to the target and 310 (%i:scaleAD%) to other enemies in a 2-hex radius.

Then throw the target forward, dealing 100 (%i:scaleAD%) in a 1-hex area around the target. If the target drops below 18% (%i:scaleAP%) health, throw them off the board instead.

skill.name: Magic Bouncing Bullet
skill.desc:
Fire a bullet at the farthest enemy, dealing 360 (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage to the first target hit. The bullet bounces to a nearby enemy, dealing 85 (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage.

Potential (0%i:set14AmpIcon%): Bullets bounce +0 (%i:set14AmpIcon%) times.

skill.name: Grand Guillotine
skill.desc: Heal 90 (%i:scaleAP%), then deal 215 (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to the current target, increased by 60% against Tanks. If the target dies, immediately recast dealing 75% damage.

skill.name: Steel Chair Slam
skill.desc:
Passive: Every 7 seconds the next attack deals 114 (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleHealth%) bonus physical damage.

Active: Gain 240 (%i:scaleAP%) maximum health over 1.5 seconds and immediately trigger the passive.

skill.name: The World Stands Still
skill.desc:
Ekko was pulled from another universe by the Isekai augment.

Freeze all units while attacking the nearest 4 enemies 7 total times. Each attack deals 200 (%i:scaleAP%) bonus magic damage,

skill.name: Rising Spell Force
skill.desc:
Fire a blast at the current target, dealing 230 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage and 115 (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage.

Potential (0%i:set14AmpIcon%): Blink a short distance, then gain 25% Attack Speed for 5 seconds and 0 (%i:set14AmpIcon%) Attack Damage and Ability Power for the rest of combat.

skill.name: Piston Punch
skill.desc: Gain 250 (%i:scaleAP%) Shield for 3 seconds and deal 350 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to the target.

skill.name: Sword Protocol: Powerful Strike
skill.desc: Gain a shield for 4 seconds and deal magic damage to all enemies within a 2-hex cone. The primary target takes additional magic damage.

skill.name: Sword Protocol: Ultimate Strike
skill.desc:
Gain a shield for 3 seconds and deal magic damage to enemies in a 3-hex cone.

Every 3 cast, unleash a powerful strike that deals magic damage in a 4-hex line and stuns enemies for 1.5 seconds.

skill.name: Golden Giga Gun
skill.desc:
Deal 305 (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to the lowest health enemy within 2 hexes. If the target dies, 30% %i:scaleAP% chance to gain 1 gold.

Gold Earned: 0

skill.name: Mighty Blade of Justice
skill.desc:
Heal 386 (%i:scaleHealth%%i:scaleAP%) and deal 150 (%i:scaleHealth%%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to the target.

Potential (0%i:set14AmpIcon%): Gain 1 stack on cast. Each stack grants 2 (%i:set14AmpIcon%) max Health. (0 Stacks: 0 %i:scaleHealth%)

skill.name: Gadagadagada!
skill.desc:
Passive: Gain 8% (%i:scaleAP%) Attack Speed for each attack against the same target, up to 80% (%i:scaleAP%).

Active: For 6 seconds, gain 90% Attack Damage and grant two nearby allies 20% Attack Damage, prioritizing Attack champions.

skill.name: Soul Stitch / Rip The Threads
skill.desc:
Passive: Attacks deal 10 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage, and 40 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage split between enemies in a cone. Every 3rd cast is Rip the Threads.

Soul Stitch: Fire 3 needles through the board, dealing 35 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to enemies hit and leaving threads behind.

Rip The Threads: Deal 320 (%i:scaleAP%) split between all enemies and 80 (%i:scaleAP%) bonus magic damage to each. Enemies near at least one thread take 10% more damage.

skill.name: Crystal Chrysalis
skill.desc: Grant 80 (%i:scaleAP%) shield to the 2 lowest Health allies for 4 seconds and fire 4 butterflies dealing 520 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage split between the 2 closest enemies.

skill.name: Mega Drill Crash
skill.desc: Gain 532 (%i:scaleAP%%i:scaleHealth%) Shield for 4 seconds, then slam into a group of enemies, dealing 100 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to enemies within a 2 hex radius and Stunning them for 1.5 seconds.

skill.name: Thundering Hammerstrike
skill.desc:
Deal 200 (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage to enemies in a 1-hex radius centered on the target.

Potential (0%i:set14AmpIcon%): Shoot 0 (%i:set14AmpIcon%) sparks split between the 3 nearest enemies. Sparks deal 70 (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage and reduce armor by 3.

skill.name: The Curtain Falls
skill.desc: Passive: Attack Speed is always 0.75. Convert 1% bonus Attack Speed into 0.8% Attack Damage. Every fourth attack is enhanced to deal 220 (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage.

skill.name: Star Rocket Blast Off!
skill.desc:
Passive: Attacks grant 6% (%i:scaleAP%) stacking Attack Speed, up to 60% (%i:scaleAP%). Critical strikes instead grant 9% (%i:scaleAP%).

Active: Deal 200 (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to the target and 575 (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage split across a 2-hex radius centered on the target.

skill.name: Missile Massacre
skill.desc:
Passive: Kills grant 1% permanent Attack Damage (+0% %i:scaleAD%).

Active: Fire 8 missiles divided between the target and nearby enemies. Each missile deals 38 (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage.

skill.name: Spirit Spear
skill.desc: Hurl a spear at the farthest enemy, dealing 440 (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to the first enemy hit. If the enemy dies the spear continues, dealing overkill damage to the next enemy hit.

skill.name: Destruction Disc
skill.desc: Fire an energy disc that deals 1050 (%i:scaleAP%) total magic damage in a 1-hex radius centered on the target.

skill.name: Teleports Behind You
skill.desc:
Blink to the enemy with the lowest health within 2 hexes and deal 140 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to enemies in a 1-hex radius.

Potential (0%i:set14AmpIcon%): Blink again, dealing 0 (%i:scaleAP%%i:set14AmpIcon%) magic damage.

skill.name: Unleash the Demon
skill.desc:
Passive: Attacks deal 33 (%i:scaleAP%) bonus magic damage. Gain additional power based on your Tactician level.

Level 6: Every 3rd attack launches a wave that deals 50 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage and 20% Shreds enemies for 3 seconds.
Level 9: Every attack launches a wave. Waves travel farther.

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist

skill.name: Eye of the Hurricane
skill.desc: Heal 245 (%i:scaleHealth%%i:scaleAP%), then deal 100 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to the 2 nearest enemies and Stun them for 1 seconds.

skill.name: Golden Paw Mantra
skill.desc: Gain 325 (%i:scaleAP%) Shield for 3 seconds. The next attack deals 244 (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleHealth%) bonus physical damage and Stuns for 1.5 seconds.

skill.name: Static Surge
skill.desc:
Passive: Attacks deal 50 (%i:scaleAP%) bonus magic damage. Increase Max Attack Speed to 6.

Active: The next attack deals 55 (%i:scaleAP%) bonus magic damage to the target and the 2 closest enemies, then 30% Shred and Sunder them for 4 seconds. On-cast, gain 15% Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist
Sunder: Reduce Armor

skill.name: Breakout Force
skill.desc:
Passive (ALL OUT): On first death instead heal to full, gain 125% Attack Speed, convert 50% of Armor and Magic Resist into Attack Damage, and set max mana to 30. Then dash through the target and briefly Stun them. While ALL OUT, lose 6% Health each second and heal 300 (%i:scaleHealth%) on kill.

Active: Gain 45% (%i:scaleAP%) Durability for 3 seconds, then deal 144 (%i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR%) physical damage to the target.

Active (ALL OUT): . Deal 350 (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to the target.

skill.name: A Demonstration of Skill
skill.desc:
Field Lee Sin to choose a stance. Each stance has a unique ability, and grants Lee Sin a bonus trait.

Juggernaut Stance: Big Bang Punch
Briefly gain 60% Durability, then deal 575 (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage to the target, 200 (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to all enemies behind the target, and 150 (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to other enemies in a 2-hex radius.
---
Duelist Stance: 10,000 Fist Flurry
Passive: On attack, deal 40 (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to a nearby enemy.

Active: Strike swiftly, sending 10 (%i:scaleAS%) afterimages to the nearest 2 enemies. Each deals 65 (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage and reduces armor by 5 (%i:scaleAP%).
---
Executioner Stance: Crashing Meteor Kicks
Deal 375 (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage to the lowest Health enemy within 3 hexes and Stun them for 1.5 seconds. Other enemies in a 1-hex radius take 130 (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage.

After 3 kills with this ability all enemies instantly take 180 (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage and are Stunned for 1.5 seconds.

skill.name: Aegis of Unbreakable Dawn
skill.desc:
Shield for 600 (%i:scaleAP%) for 4 seconds and deal 60 (%i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR%) magic damage to enemies in a 2-hex radius.

Potential (0%i:set14AmpIcon%): Fire sunbursts through enemies within 3-hexes. Each steals 0 (%i:set14AmpIcon%) Armor and Magic Resist and deals 30 (%i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR%) magic damage.

skill.name: Twin Cannon Fire
skill.desc: Fire 4 shots towards the target. Each deals 85 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to the first enemy hit. For each miss, restore <scaleMana>8</scaleMana> mana.

skill.name: Choose A Monster
skill.desc: Field Lulu to choose a monster to train! Each monster has unique abilities.

skill.name: Soulfire Explosion
skill.desc:
Fire an energy ball towards the largest group of enemies containing the target. On arrival, 20% Shred enemies in a 1-hex radius for 5 seconds and deal 300 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage split between them plus 90 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to each.

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist

skill.name: Regolith Resistance
skill.desc:
Passive: Gain 12 Armor for each item equipped.

Active: Deal 189 (%i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage to enemies in a cone.

skill.name: Insidious Whispers
skill.desc:
Infect the closest 1 uninfected targets, dealing 515 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage over 15 seconds. If an infected target dies, the infection spreads to the nearest uninfected target for any remaining time.

If all enemies are infected, this effect can stack.

skill.name: Spinning Soul-Saw
skill.desc: Gain 90 (%i:scaleAP%) shield for 2 seconds, then deal 150 (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to the target.

skill.name: Falling Flower Eruption
skill.desc: Gain 40% Durability and heal 300 (%i:scaleAP%) over 2 seconds, then deal 120 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to enemies in a 2-hex radius.

skill.name: Spinning Galaxy Hammer
skill.desc: Gain 390 (%i:scaleHealth%%i:scaleAP%) Shield for 4 seconds. When it breaks, deal 250 (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to the target and 125 (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to other enemies in a 1-hex radius centered on the target. The target is Stunned for 0.5-2.5 seconds based on how long the shield held, and other enemies are briefly Stunned.

skill.name: All Eyes On Me
skill.desc:
Heal 350 (%i:scaleAP%) and deal 55 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to the 3 closest enemies.

Potential (0%i:set14AmpIcon%): Heal the 2 lowest percent Health allies for 0 (%i:set14AmpIcon%) health.

skill.name: Durian Defense
skill.desc:
Gain 475 (%i:scaleAP%) Shield for 4 seconds. Leap to the largest group within 2 hexes, dealing 48 (%i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR%) magic damage and Taunting enemies hit. Gain 15 (%i:scaleAP%) max Health per enemy Taunted.

When the Shield breaks, shoot spines at the nearest 3 enemies, repeating the damage and Stunning them for 1 second.

skill.name: Unbreakable Celestial Lance
skill.desc: Deal 130 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage in a short line through the target, then reduce damage taken by 20 (%i:scaleAP%) for 4 seconds.

skill.name: Tsunami Beam
skill.desc: Deal 770 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to the target over 3 seconds. Enemies in a 1-hex radius around the target take 110 (%i:scaleAP%) over the same duration.

skill.name: Soul Shot / Inner Arsenal Unleashed
skill.desc:
Passive: After casting, gain 1 Style and 5% Omnivamp, up to 4 stacks. At max stacks, the next cast is Inner Arsenal Unleashed.

Soul Shot: Deal 105 (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to the target and dash a short distance.

Inner Arsenal Unleashed: Double the passive bonus and leap to a nearby group of enemies, dealing 280 (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) to all enemies in a 2-hex radius. Reset your Style to 0.

skill.name: Super Beam Cannon
skill.desc:
Over 1 second, deal 400 (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage in a line through the current target. Enemies after the first take 88 (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) instead.

When no targets are left, regain mana based on the time remaining.

skill.name: Ultimate Friendship Bomb
skill.desc:
Passive: Ultimate Friendship Bomb's damage scales on Power of Friendship, which is based on all of your team's bonus stats (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%%i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR%%i:scaleAS%%i:scaleCrit%%i:scaleCritMult%%i:scaleHealth%). Stats on Seraphine contribute more.

Active: Fire a friendship bomb towards the largest group of enemies within 5 (%i:scaleRange%) hexes, dealing 0 (Power of Friendship) magic damage in a 2-hex radius.

skill.name: Maximum Grit Overdrive
skill.desc:
Over a short duration, heal 392 (%i:scaleHealth%%i:scaleAP%) and deal 140 (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to the target.

Then, deal 164 (%i:scaleHealth%%i:scaleAD%) physical damage in a cone. Enemies in the center line take 10 more physical damage, increased based on healing received this combat.

skill.name: Power Suit: Full Charge
skill.desc: Shield 400 (%i:scaleAP%) for 4 seconds. The next 3 attacks deal 34 (%i:scaleMR%) bonus true damage.

skill.name: Star Cutter
skill.desc: Launch a returning blade 2-hexes through the current target. It deals 190 (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage to enemies hit, reduced by 40% per hit.

skill.name: Burn Blast
skill.desc:
Passive: Damage Burns and Wounds for 5 seconds. Ignore 30% of the target's Armor.

Active: Deal 265 (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to the target, and 50 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to the 3 nearest targets. Every 2 casts, fire a second blast at the next closest enemy, dealing 75% damage.

Burn: Deal 1% of the target's max Health as true damage every second
Wound: Reduce healing received by 33%

skill.name: Glittering Plumage Regalia
skill.desc:
Gain 395 (%i:scaleHealth%%i:scaleAP%) max Health, then deal 25 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage every second to enemies in a 2-hex radius.

Subsequent casts heal 395 (%i:scaleHealth%%i:scaleAP%) and increase the damage by 6 (%i:scaleAP%).

skill.name: Bright Star Blast
skill.desc: Deal 215 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to the target and reduces their Magic Resist by 10.

skill.name: 52 Card Calamity
skill.desc:
Passive: Attacks bounce between 3 enemies, dealing 35 (%i:scaleAP%) bonus magic damage and marking enemies hit. Attacks deal 30% reduced damage per hit.

Active: Deal 200 (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to the 4 closest enemies, and detonate their marks for 15 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage each.

skill.name: Blazing Phoenix Stance
skill.desc: Make 3 rapid attacks. Each heals Udyr for 130 (%i:scaleAP%) and deals 35 (%i:scaleAD%) additional damage to enemies in a 1-hex radius.

skill.name: Level Zero: 100 Shot Demon
skill.desc:
Passive: Gain mana when units die. Enemies grant 5, allies 3.

Active: Fire 3 (%i:scaleAS%) piercing arrows per second at random enemies until Varus is out of mana. Each arrow costs 12 mana and deals 95 (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage, reduced by 35% per hit.

skill.name: Shining Knuckle Explosion
skill.desc:
Passive: Gain 2 %i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR% for each component equipped to your team.

Active: Heal 230 (%i:scaleAP%), deal 150 (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage in a 1-hex radius centered on the target, and 20% Sunder enemies hit for 4 seconds.

Sunder: Reduce Armor

skill.name: Combo of the Ruined King
skill.desc:
Passive: Attacks deal 60 (%i:TFTBaseAD%%i:scaleAP%) magic damage.

Active: The next three attacks unleash a devastating combo.

Pommel Bash: Deal 100 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage.
Rising Slash: Deal 100 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage and briefly Stun the target.
Falling Slash: Deal 210 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage.

skill.name: Ursine Instinct
skill.desc:
Passive: Every 4th attack deals 125 (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage in a 1-hex radius centered on the target. When changing targets, immediately slam for 70% damage.

Active: For 5 seconds gain 125% Attack Speed, 10% (%i:scaleAP%) Omnivamp, and crowd control immunity.

skill.name: PBEWraithDamageTracker
skill.desc: TBA

skill.name: Sharp Feathers Shine
skill.desc: Gain 80% (%i:scaleAP%) attack speed for 3 attacks. These attacks deal 50 (%i:scaleAD%) bonus physical damage to the target and 2 nearby enemies

skill.name: Guarding Crescent
skill.desc: Heal 290 (%i:scaleAP%), deal 100 (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to enemies in a 2-hex radius, and mark the current target. For 3 seconds, take 40% reduced damage from unmarked enemies.

skill.name: Unsheath the Storm
skill.desc: Deal 180 (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to the 3 closest enemies.

skill.name: Dual Blade Technique: Inner Reflection
skill.desc:
Passive: Attacks grant 4.5% stacking Attack Speed and Movement Speed, and alternate between dealing 25 (%i:scaleAD%) bonus true damage and 100 (%i:scaleAP%) bonus magic damage.

Active: Send an echo towards the two furthest enemies, dealing 120 (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage and briefly Stunning enemies hit.

skill.name: Read Or Die
skill.desc:
Launch 20 pages dealing 25 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage each, split between the target and enemies within 2 hexes. Each subsequent cast launches 4 more pages.

Potential (0%i:set14AmpIcon%): Every 4 pages, launch a bonus page that deals 0 (%i:set14AmpIcon%%i:scaleAP%) true damage.

skill.name: Reality Ripple
skill.desc: Heal 240 (%i:scaleAP%) and deal 146 (%i:scaleAP%%i:scaleHealth%) magic damage to enemies within a 1-hex radius.

skill.name: Orbital Ordinance
skill.desc:
Passive: Attacks are bouncing bombs that deal 70 (%i:scaleAP%%i:TFTBaseAD%) magic damage to the first enemy hit.

Active: Deal 230 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage in a 1-hex radius centered on the target.

skill.name: Crystal Thorn Expansion
skill.desc:
Summon 4 untargetable Thornspitters that deal 90 (%i:scaleAP%) per attack and attack 4 times.

Non-plant allies gain 35% (%i:scaleAP%) Attack Speed decaying over 4 seconds.

skill.name: Crystal Barbs
skill.desc: Attacks deal 70 (%i:scaleAP%) bonus magic damage.

skill.name: Crystal Barbs
skill.desc: Attacks deal 80 (%i:scaleAP%) bonus magic damage.

skill.name: Training Dummy
skill.desc: aUse on a champion to spawn a movable target dummy nearby. Cannot be used in combat.
